content: as they need to be removed before they distribute them 5 make sure all your yarn ends are sewn in 6 is your finger puppet 100% complete partially finished items cannot be used 7 ask yourself-is this an item i would be proud to give to a family member or a friend making big smiles with peace pals peace pals formerly pocket peace pals were developed by knitting4peace volunteers to create comforting companions for children in global areas of conflict they re loved and appreciated by all ages and are their most-requested item the pals are more than toys they are companions in coping with stress and building children s self- esteem you can find their patterns on knitting4peace s pattern page 7
